name: Dentou
description:
A puzzle platformer that focuses on moving two characters at once.

Use a unique stasis ability to move throughout the puzzles! Just hold and aim to select a block and connect to it! Its a simple system to  figure out. All of the puzzles are fun and interesting! they will really get you brain going.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

WASD to move

hold click and aim to select a block to connect to, release to connect to the block.

Jump and hold click to enter bullet time.

You can connect to multiple blocks at the same time.
